mapper.sql: id, uid, orderCode, sum, totalNumber, address, receiver, mobile, userMessage, createDate, payDate, deliverDate, confirmDate, status, deleteAt
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from details_
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from details_ where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleteAt is NULL
mapper.insert: insert into details_ (uid, orderCode, sum, totalNumber, address, receiver, mobile, userMessage, createDate, payDate, deliverDate, confirmDate, status, deleteAt) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into details_
uid,
orderCode,
sum,
totalNumber,
address,
receiver,
mobile,
userMessage,
createDate,
payDate,
deliverDate,
confirmDate,
status,

mapper.update:
update details_
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orderCode = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sum = #{sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
totalNumber = #{totalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userMessage = #{userMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
payDate = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deliverDate = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
confirmDate = #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleteAt = #{deleteAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update details_ set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderCode = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sum = #{sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalNumber = #{totalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userMessage = #{userMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payDate = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deliverDate = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, confirmDate = #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleteAt = #{deleteAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE details_ set deliverDate = #{date} where id = #{id}
